dmca.title: Copyright Infringment on site on IP 70.87.196.34 - BikiniBikini.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: David [mailto:webmaster@FrancineDee.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, October 10, 2006 9:53 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Copyright Infringment on site on IP 70.87.196.34 -
BikiniBikini.com
Subject: Copyright Infringment on site on IP 70.87.196.34 -
BikiniBikini.com


Dear Sirs. 


We have contacted this website regarding images owned by Francine Dee
and FrancineDee.com   with a DMCA notice on two occasions.    

We had no response to either notice, and nothing was done on the site to
remove our content that is being illegally posted on this site. 

Please have our content removed from this site ore the site removed ( as
it is All copyrighted material, just most of the owners do not know it
is here! ) 

------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------

Copyright Infringement Notification

as per the Digital Millennium Copyright  Act, U.S. Law.
http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf to view DMCA.

 
 
Dear Sirs,
 
I am authorized to act on behalf David Grieshaber, the owner of the
exclusive rights to the following copyrighted material:
 
Francine Dee Photos
 
These pages are in violation of our copyrights. You were not legally
given rights to use these photos. 
 
This copyrighted material is currently being infringed at the following
URLs and/or the infringing activity is found at the following URLs:
 

http://www.bikinibikini.com
<http://www.bikinibikini.com/> and 
http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?f=10&order=desc 

 
We request that the foregoing photos or web site be removed or access to
it disabled, this user Dose Not have permission from the copyright owner
to access our copyrighted material. You may contact me as follows:
 
David Grieshaber  FrancineDee.com
22Mandalay Pl
South San Francisco, CA 94080
415.310.7295
webmaster@FrancineDee.com
 
 
On behalf of the owner of the exclusive right to the copyrighted
material at issue in this notice, I hereby state that I have a good
faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
 
I hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of California
and under the laws of the United States, that the information in this
notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the
complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an
exclusive right that is being infringed as set out in this notification.
Dated: ________10/004/2006_____________________
 
Signature of Your Name: ____David Grieshaber ( e-signature ) ___ 






Regards..

David 

FrancineDee.com 

WebMaster@FrancineDee.com
